nodes.text: T8X-4 was an astromech droid that served the Sith Empire aboard Vaiken Spacedock during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic.

T8X-4 appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel as the Imperial quest giver for the "Assault on Tython" flashpoint, though he is only found aboard Vaiken Spacedock and not on other planets like other flashpoint quest givers.
